description: By appearances a teenager, Lulu is a shin who dresses in a gothic lolita fashion and has light-pink pigtailed hair. She seems to get flirtatious around http://anidb.net/ch12157 [Akira], but immediately expresses a dislike for http://anidb.net/ch12176 [Aya], calling her a "gorilla woman".
name: Lulu
